attributes.action: Stricter Laws On Legal Highs In The UK
attributes.additional_details:
Over the past years there has been a dramatic increase in the use and abuse of legal highs, due to ineffective laws regarding legal highs. People are poorly educated on the subject so don't realize that the consequences of legal highs can often be far worse than already illegal drugs. They're far too easy to obtain and can do even more damage if the issue isn't resolved.

JUST BECAUSE THEY'RE LEGAL DOESN'T MEAN THEY'RE SAFE!!!!!
